By clicking "I Agree" below, I agree to join the Twimight Beta data collection. The Twimight Beta application will collect data that samples Twimight application usage statistics and my location during application usage.
I understand that access to any data collected will only be allowed to the members of the Twimight research team and only for the purpose of research performed in the context of the Twimight project. Any published results of this study will only refer to anonymised and obfuscated data, and aggregated statistics that do not reveal the identities of the participants. As a participant I have the right to opt out of this study at any time during this experiment by uninstalling the application. Moreover, I have the right to access any information in the data set related to me, and request for all collected data to be removed. As a user of Twimight Beta I may participate in the Twimight Beta online competition.

If you loose Internet connectivity, activate the disaster mode hit the "D" button in the menu bar. Disaster tweets will epidemically spread among all phones in disaster mode, without the need for Internet infrastructure (3G, WLAN).Note that while the disaster mode is active, your phone will not connect to the Internet through WLAN. If you need Internet connection and you are in range of a WLAN access point, disable the disaster mode.
